website_summaries.verdict: Minimal chair design for a simple office setup.
pros: Narrow profile is perfect for small spaces since it is easy to keep out of the way when not in use
Vinyl finish protects the chair from spills and heavy use
Good amount of height adjustment to accommodate different tables
cons: Carpet casters can get stuck depending on the type of flooring

customer_reviews.title: great for the price
customer_reviews.text: good all around chair, pros: -perfect height I needed to straddle up to my work bench I built in my garage -good casters (tile or in my case concrete, not sure about carpet) -sturdy build -cost, not to shabby -easy to put together Cons: Only gripe I have is the lack of recline; in fact it's stiff as hell if you're trying to lean back. I understand chairs this high run the risk of spill over but still; it would be nice to lean back just a little; otherwise I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: JAMES KERRY

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value - Adjusts from  23-1/2"-33-1/2" to top of cushion.
customer_reviews.text: I bought without the arm rests. The cushion is slightly small; doesn't quite provide full side-to-side width for a 35" waist. There is a very slight wobble, but not unexpected since it's just a press-fit for the center column and it is a tall chair. No concerns about it falling over and rolls easily on an area rug. The seat does sink a little when sitting, but it stays at the adjusted height with a 200lb weight on it. The cushion is firm and, with the back and foot rests expect to be able to use it for several hours without discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: Wag D'Tail

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, durable taskmaster for the price
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and cushy for the price! I use it with a stand-up desk and I'm constantly sitting down/standing up/moving the chair around and it's held up really well. Footrest is also sturdy, which is usually a rare thing in these less expensive chairs (and I've gone through several of them!). Assembly instructions are not great but it's pretty intuitive. If you're on the fence about this chair- try it out. Great deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Isabelle27

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the Price
customer_reviews.text: For an OK adjustable chair the price is right. The seat to me however is hard as a rock and the foot bar always comes loose. The back of the seat for a 5' 5" average women is far back. If you have the extra money I would buy something else. If your on a tight budget and need something for a higher desk, it will work. UPDATE: After only a few months and very little use of the chair, it's falling apart. Not only is the foot bar unstable now the cushion to the back of the chair is coming apart from the plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Shan13

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I hoped for!
customer_reviews.text: I have an autoimmune illness and needed a counter height stool to sit while I work in kitchen or bathroom. Was difficulty finding a kitchen stool with wheels. This is soft, comfy and easy to move around. Perfect for what I was looking for. I'm 5'8" and it goes high enough to where my feet don't touch ground, but I love that I can reach to cook. The seat is large and support my legs from hip to knee, which is a rare find for me, but might not be for everyone. Directions were a little confusing, but my 16 year old son helped me see where I went wrong and it wasn't difficult to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle K.

customer_reviews.title: Good chair
customer_reviews.text: This is a good chair, comfortable, easy to assemble, and great for the shop. I had read the reviews about how the footrest does not stay in place. Upon assembly it was obvious it was merely a problem of friction, so I slapped some plumbers tape on one of the steel sleeves and it works great, and it still adjusts too. One of the bolts to assemble the backrest was a little difficult to get to, so I just left the plastic sleeve off and that made it easier.
customer_reviews.author: K.W.

customer_reviews.title: Bought Two, And They're Different
customer_reviews.text: They're visually the same, but one has a backrest that pivots a bit, the other does not. Took the back of the seat off and noted that the way the backrest attaches is difference between the two. Had to modify the chair that DOES pivot, as it was causing the back to pop off when leaning back in the chair due to a clearance issue. This is not an issue on the chair that has NO backrest pivot adjustment. Other that that issue, the seats are comfy, the hydraulics are holding up ok, but they feel tippy and light and the foot rest will not stay in place no mater how hard I tighten the knob.
customer_reviews.author: Takuro Spirit

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This chair was super easy to assemble and seems very sturdy. I have been using it all day for a few weeks and it doesn't seem to be dropping throughout the day. I use this tall chair so that I don't have to adjust my janky standing desk in order to sit. It work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Megz

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have a sit/stand desk, but I found that it would be much easier to just have a higher chair than to raise the desk. This chair has a great range of heights and can be used at regular desks as well as at standing desks. The wheels move quite well, and the seat and back supports are both very comfortable. Now, when I am tired from standing at my desk for several hours, I just scoot up my compact chair and take a 30 minute break for standing. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Ruggiero

customer_reviews.title: Great build quality!
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was delayed for a week but it finally arrived. My review is based on previous purchases of office furniture (desks, cabinets, chairs, etc.) from the two major office supply stores. When it comes to chairs I like to take them for a test drive before purchasing. I made an exception this go-round due to the number of quality reviews. The bones (metal and seat) of the chair are made from quality materials. The covers for the cylinder back support are both made of plastic but shouldn't be subject to any abnormal wear-and-tear. The wheels are good size and roll easily on carpet. All-in-all, quite satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: jwc

customer_reviews.title: Nice Drafting Chair
customer_reviews.text: I needed a chair for my 34" tall work table, and the seat height needed to be about 26". Just too tall for the average office chair to reach. This works great. It gets very tall, which could turn out handy some day. Pretty easy to put together. It's comfortable, though there is no tilt to the seat (it didn't say it would, so not surprised). Way better than leaning over the table for hours.
customer_reviews.author: ez_cheez

customer_reviews.title: Solid and comfortable chair.
customer_reviews.text: I like the chair very much. I had to have help getting the backrest on the seat, you really need an extra set of hands, but everything else went together quite easily. I'm an artist and work at a really high work surface. This chair did the job. I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: N. L. Yergin

customer_reviews.title: Broke after one month use.
customer_reviews.text: The chair was delivered June 9. Noticed a gap in the back of the chair on July 13. The peg holding the cushion pulled out of the pressed wood. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: a lot heavier and better quality I thought for the price
customer_reviews.text: Just put this together in 20 min, sat on it and it's freakin amazing!!!! I was really suprised how big the box was and taking the parts out of the box and how heavy it was, really great quality. Also, the hydralic thingy is really smooth and goes up and down really nicely. Going to have to fool around with the footrest put shouldn't be an issue. After hours of research on here, I finally chose this chair and glad I did!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: great chair for the price! So far no comfort issues. I have sat on it for hours with no back problems. I am 6' at 225 lbs. supports me well - - feels sturdy enough. foot rest does does not stay put regardless how much you tighten the knob. it slowly slides down over time as you use it. quickfix: I put a layer of duct tape around the surface I wanted to clamp the footrest to. holds up very well now.
customer_reviews.author: mayozack

customer_reviews.title: Great for standing desk.
customer_reviews.text: This thing was easy to put together, and easily adjusts to the right height for my standing desk. I like standing, but my feet start killing me after a while, so this stool is perfect. I like that it has a foot rest -- keeps my legs from just hanging over the edge of the seat and losing circulation. I'd recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: ijohn

customer_reviews.title: Works I guess
customer_reviews.text: The ring that you put your feet on is to high. The chair back is flat and not as near contoured as the one in the picture. The bottom part is thicker and also has no contour. It suites my needs and I can't be bothered to send it back so an extra star for that I guess.
customer_reviews.author: User

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Quick shipment, great packing, good instructions, minimal parts, hex key Allen wrench provided, quick & easy assembly, sturdy & comfortable. Purchased 2 of these. Would buy again. Highly recommend! Available in black only and no color choice, but it is what it is.
customer_reviews.author: kazekozo77

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: This is a cheap chair and it would be surprising if it lasts more than a year with regular use. Most all the more negative comments are correct. The more expensive chairs had just as many negative comments, so it's not clear which might be a bigger waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Fan

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a solid standing desk height task chair.
customer_reviews.text: It's been a struggle to find affordable, durable seating that was actually tall enough for my standing desk. This seat offers durable, all day comfort and is easy to adjust. I've used it for a couple months now without issue. Don't let the low price fool you, this is a durable, well built and comfortable all day task chair.
customer_reviews.author: Chris M

customer_reviews.title: Good height range
customer_reviews.text: I would give it 5 stars except the price went way up! The adjustment range is perfect for us, and it is easy to get on and off. But because the price went up so high, we bought a similar chair with a round seat at one third the price. The round seat chair won't adjust as low by about two inches, so we prefer this sculptured seat chair, but a 3X price difference is too much. We use the chairs in a lab environment, so it is OK to mix styles.
customer_reviews.author: R. Chung

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly sturdy
customer_reviews.text: For $70, I was expecting a slightly wobbly chair. However, the base and seat are stable and sturdy. I have it at almost the highest setting (I’m 5’2”) and it still feels stable. I like how the footrest is adjustable. I recommend if you’re looking for an inexpensive but reliable chair
customer_reviews.author: CHB

customer_reviews.title: Broke within 2 days of light use.
customer_reviews.text: Dont bother, quality is not there. After maybe sitting on it for 5 hours, the backrest came apart. Maybe it was just the chair I received but the quality is just very low.
customer_reviews.author: AC0303

customer_reviews.title: BEST HIGHBOY CHAIR EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and the height is perfect for my arthritis knees! I love it!! Purchased a seat cover to look better in my home office. It’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Ann

customer_reviews.title: Good Workbench Chair
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my garage at my workbench. The height range is excellent and the cushions are very comfortable. I also like the foot ring.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin in Houston

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly serviceable chair - good value for price
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my standing-height work table at home. It is not particularly ergonomic or supportive, but it absolutely does the job. I was worried because the instructions were so short, but they told me all I needed to know and I was able to put the chair together alone with relative ease. Would definitely recommend for part-time chair.
customer_reviews.author: BookPolice

customer_reviews.title: The rest of the chair is pretty solid, so those minor complaints aren't a deal-breaker ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price, can't complain. I wound up making a choke collar to fit underneath the foot rest, because the built in tension screw is way too weak to keep it in place. The back has the same problem, but I just raise it manually every day or two. The rest of the chair is pretty solid, so those minor complaints aren't a deal-breaker for me.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is a great chair for the price. The adjustable height is fabulous. I wish the rest of the chair adjusted as easily. Sadly, adjusting the rest of the chair is not quite as simple, making it not as user friendly as I would have liked!
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Connelly

customer_reviews.title: Works for my needs.
customer_reviews.text: This works great for when I am at my quilting machine when I am doing free motion work. I was looking for a chair that was on wheels and raised to the levels I would need to do my work. And this is it! And it was a breeze to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Torrie Coffman

customer_reviews.title: Quality not Good.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality. I purchased two of these chairs for my lab and within a month the back cushion of both chairs started coming apart.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great design, excellent quality and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality product that is well designed, easy to assemble and very comfortable. I am actually really happy that I did not select a chair with armrests. They have to be very configurable to work and most aren't. I would definitely buy this chair again and highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Savy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: My second purchase.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I bought. It's apparently the same, though one of the thin plastic parts, for sliding over a connection, was a bit crumpled. It still works just fine but the crumpling hasn't faded away so it doesn't look quite perfect. All in all, it's a good chair and I don't have any complaints. If the seat could tip forward slightly, it'd be more ergonomic.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly J. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great chair
customer_reviews.text: Great chair so far. It is inside a guard shack amd is used 24/7 365 days a yr. Will update if it breaks in anyway and how long it held out until it broke if it does in fact break. Doubt it good quality great chair. Goes high and low.
customer_reviews.author: Shotgun Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Good value and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect seat which I use occasionally with my standing desk. Overall construction is what I would expect with a sub $100 chair. There were a few scratches but it doesn't impact usability. The scratches are probably from the poor packaging. The parts were just tossed in a box. Also - if you need a decent sense of how to assemble chairs because the instructions consists of 5 sentences.
customer_reviews.author: JLP

customer_reviews.title: Small: Small seat and small base, makes it feel "tippy".
customer_reviews.text: The Faux Leather is pretty good, the seat and base are too small. The knob on the back bumps into are catches onto shelves in tight spaces. Not to hard to put together, next to impossible to take apart to return.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Great solution!
customer_reviews.text: Stand all day in a studio and needed something to take weight off a bad knee and hip while still being able to have the height of standing and ability to move back and forth at an easel - this was the perfect solution! Sturdy and stable, rolls easily, and reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Robin A. Macke

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it just hated the instructions they were a bit confusing since its dosnt go in details. If you are purchasing this item make sure to take out the cardboard from the cylinder where your feet goes because the instructions dosnt say it. So other that building this chair i adore it. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: cristal moreno

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Expected
customer_reviews.text: Better quality than I was expecting. Only issue is minor - the ring that you can put your foot on doesn't cling to the pillar (?), and slowly slips downward, so I've had to pull it back up every week or two.
customer_reviews.author: Solomonic Bacchanal

customer_reviews.title: A great chair for my messy workspace.
customer_reviews.text: This chair is everything I wanted. Light enough to pick up a bit and move over cords on the floor but sturdy enough to wear well. There were no installation instructions so I assembled one thing upside down. It was easily remedied but it ought to have instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff T.

customer_reviews.title: WFH tall desk chair
customer_reviews.text: Since I am now working from home and I’m using a tall desk it became imperative I get a chair. This was easy to assemble and only took 5 minutes and it has not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Arrowood

customer_reviews.title: Wide seat and foot rest can handle some weight...
customer_reviews.text: Great chair! I have a studio apt, wood floors, and island in the kitchen/living room. The island is mostly a desk area (don't cook) so I needed a chair tall enough to work on the island. It was easy to assemble. I was worried about the foot rest to handle my weight (190lbs) but it handle it to scoot up. The seat is wide and so far it's good!
customer_reviews.author: Judy T

customer_reviews.title: A FANTASTIC buy.
customer_reviews.text: I'm sitting in this chair now. At my standing desk. It goes up HIGH, dude. it's comfortable. I can lean back and feel supported! At around 80 bucks for this, my God what a steal.
customer_reviews.author: Will Akana

customer_reviews.title: Chair fits my need exactly!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, sturdy, has adequate wheel use and provides excellent height adjustments for my need. Only complaint is that the ring is difficult to adjust and the default height is too high for my legs. Fortunately, I am tall enough that I don't need to use the rimg.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Stover

customer_reviews.title: great for drawing table
customer_reviews.text: I got this to replace a regular office chair (which sat too low) for my drawing/drafting table. It is very sturdy, was easy to assemble and is the perfect height for doing my drawing projects.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Great chair, very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: This chair is well designed and comfortable at all heights. I'm just curious as to where can I find the arm rests that it has mounting holes for?
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Great Chair
customer_reviews.text: Its really comfy and fit my very large craft table perfectly. I can sit up high to my craft table or lower it to a regular desk. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty Mcdaniel

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Nice chair for the price range. It was easy to assemble and it is perfect for my tall work bench. The adjustable foot rest is a nice touch too.
customer_reviews.author: BrentTop Contributor: Gardening

customer_reviews.title: Great chair!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome chair for the price!! The instructions aren’t the best, but it’s easy to figure out. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bernie Stewart

customer_reviews.title: comfortable and great range of adjustment
customer_reviews.text: Ditto all the other positive reviews. Very solid, comfortable and great range of adjustment.
customer_reviews.author: Eric206

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, easy to adjust
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my mother. She wanted a stool for the kitchen to make tasks that would normally have her on her feet for an extended time easier. It was easy to assemble and has lot of height adjustment. This chair has surpassed all expectations it is comfortable, easy to adjust and has been used far more than it’s original purpose. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great product and easy to put together.
customer_reviews.text: Nice clear instructions and easy to put together. Finished chair comfortable and adjustable. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Geoff Hallett

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: The chair is comfortable. Have had it for a few months and it still looks good. I had my husband assemble.
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: Price is right
customer_reviews.text: This is the best chair I've had in 10 years. No old was rickety and uncomfortable but then again I had it for along time.
customer_reviews.author: PunkRocker=61!

customer_reviews.title: Very good product, and found solution for casters rolling
customer_reviews.text: This chair feels and looks great, and was fairly easy to assemble. Some reviewers raised questions about it rolling too freely on hard floors when you don't want it to move. I put a mesh non-slip shelf liner under the chair area and it's perfect - the chair stops rolling, yet you can roll it when you want to. I have a nice looking light-brown liner. You can get a fairly large size - I folded mine in half before putting it down.
customer_reviews.author: Norman D. Wahl

customer_reviews.title: Good buy - excellent value - no gotchas
customer_reviews.text: Seems well constructed and durable. Looks nice and seating is comfortable. I didn't notice any sag but I'm only 150 lbs. Easy to assemble. Ideal height ranges for just about any desk or workbench. The only thing it doesn't do is pump up by hand. To raise the seat you must stand and manually raise it. But I doubt if you will see that feature in this price range. The five casters enable you to really scoot around on an uncarpeted surface. Overall, an excellent value for utilitarian settings.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lehv

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Actually bought it to move around the kitchen due to health issues not being able to stand, this is the best chair. Comfortable and study.
customer_reviews.author: heather daly

customer_reviews.title: Great Chair
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my sewing/craft table and sewing...easy to assemble, can use at lower level to sew, and other levels for cutting/crafts.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Very Poor Quality Item
customer_reviews.text: This item came quickly; however, it was very uncomfortable and was constructed very poorly. I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Parent

customer_reviews.title: Works well with drafting table.
customer_reviews.text: A bit difficult to lower the seat and tweak preferred settings. Would not work if frequent adjustments were needed. Reasonably comfortable with ring for foot rest.
customer_reviews.author: Else

customer_reviews.title: Very Good work Stool
customer_reviews.text: I am 6'6'' with 38" inseam on pants and this stool is perfect because of the adjustable foot rest. Well made and easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: EE

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product my wife loves it better than her employer issued chair, especially with her sit/stand desk riser!
customer_reviews.author: Ajax

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by this chair. I am not sure why, but in the pictures it looked smaller than it really is. There is plenty of sitting room, it's really comfortable. It was a little difficult to get the main support bar into the base of the chair. I had to shove the chair into it before it really locked into position, but it did!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Quality product, it would be worth $120 much less the $80 I paid for it. Took about 10 minutes to put together, rolled it right out to the work bench. Height range is greater than needed but nice to have
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable !
customer_reviews.text: This chair was easy to assemble, and very comfortable to sit in. So we ordered another one !
customer_reviews.author: Con G.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value - quality chair
customer_reviews.text: Well made; good material and craftsmanship; secure and protective packaging; easy 10 minute assembly; rolls smoothly; adjusts easily and holds positions; strong footrest ring. Be advised that I weigh 160 lbs
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: HYDROLIC LIFT IS JAMMED
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to put together, but once I did, I raised the seat and it jammed in that position. I will return the item.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Marte

customer_reviews.title: Great chair for my art table
customer_reviews.text: Awesome and comfy. It is still rather high even in the lowest setting but the foot rest comes in handy for shorties like me
customer_reviews.author: Anayma Shreeve-Colón

customer_reviews.title: The drafting chair was tall enough for my desk.
customer_reviews.text: I wish the seat was a bit more padded. I also bought a lumbar back cushion for extra support, as the back was a bit far for me. It works great with my desk being higher.
customer_reviews.author: Pam S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice chair
customer_reviews.text: ordered to use for office use and it works great, easy to install and use.
customer_reviews.author: A Patel

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I was really surprised at how nice these were for the money. Easy to set up and nice. This fall will be the test when the kids use them for cyber school.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Denenberg

customer_reviews.title: Useful but not the best quality
customer_reviews.text: Works great for what I need but the back plastic popped out of the particle board after a week.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Withers

customer_reviews.title: Quality is excellent. Purchased rollerblade wheels as well
customer_reviews.text: Quality is excellent. Purchased rollerblade wheels as well, which is a fantastic upgrade
customer_reviews.author: Dave the Otter

customer_reviews.title: Great chair
customer_reviews.text: bought 2 of these for the office and love them! took a chance getting them online, but I was not disappointed. they are super comfy. don't let the fact that they are vinyl deter you --they really are very comfortable. they look good and the fact that they are vinyl makes them very affordable. I also like how well they roll - not sluggish or skittish like some chairs I've tried. overall great chair! highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Flavorgirl

customer_reviews.title: COMFORT
customer_reviews.text: This chair is used in our shop for our technicians assembling motors, pumps and drive motors. They love the comfort and flexibility of this product. When we expand our shop we will purchase more. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Back Support and Easy to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: I just received the chair. It took about 15 minutes to put together. The minute I sat in it I knew I made a good purchase. The back support is nice and stiff, so it offers great lower back support. The wheels glide smoothly also, so it's easy to move around from desk to desk. The seat cushion is also comfortable. I would recommend this chair.
customer_reviews.author: S. DB

customer_reviews.title: As expected worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a great height/chair for my standing desk —so glad I listened to the reviews
customer_reviews.author: no name please

customer_reviews.title: Delivered without the screws 🤦‍♀️
customer_reviews.text: This box arrived without the screws needed to screw the seat into the seat-plate. I tried using some leftover screws from another project, but they weren't the right size and the chair worked okay for a few days then plunged me to the floor unexpectedly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and outstanding value!
customer_reviews.text: Very well-made product. All parts secure well. Apparently the maker has listened to review comments regarding the foot rest because the inner collar secures it solidly. The chair is comfortable and moves easily up and down to accommodate my position at my drawing table and easel when I choose to sit. Outstanding value.
customer_reviews.author: J B

customer_reviews.title: I like the height, but the back support is falling apart
customer_reviews.text: I like the height, but the back support is falling apart, I will not recommend, unless you don't the chair falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We have these at our office and love them. Very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: C. P.

customer_reviews.title: Nice chair for the money
customer_reviews.text: A good chair for the money. It will receive light use at a soldering workbench and is fine for that. The padding is comfortable for short time periods but is not supportive enough for all day use.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin S.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and comfy. Moves on tile pretty easily. Sure beats standing at craft tables. Surprised it was so reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Kay of CB, IA

customer_reviews.title: Great Chair for the price!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the chair, works just perfect. Seat has good cushion and chair feels very stable. I put the chair together in 20 minutes (female 58) Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Debonair

customer_reviews.title: great for standing desk.
customer_reviews.text: I like that I have the option to sit or stand at a stand up desk.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Beamon

customer_reviews.title: Great Chair!
customer_reviews.text: This chair is quality with a capital "Q". Easy to assemble and a great durable piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: frogface

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Use it every day, holding up fine. Good height adjustment, good casters, like the foot rest.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Chair/Stoll
customer_reviews.text: Back surgery required a standing desk, so we needed a high standing chair/stool. This is perfect!! Quick delivery; good packaging; pretty easy assembly. Works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Badriyyah

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Hi quality, very comfortable, well worth the money. Works like it should.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Bill

customer_reviews.title: It is comfortable! It feels sturdy!  I am now at the correct level at my computer-desk.  I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I like the padded seat and the back rest is just right for me. I look forward to many years of enjoyment! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: sue george

customer_reviews.title: easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: I am short so needed the seat height this provided.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret McFarland

customer_reviews.title: not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: We did not find this chair comfortable. Do not use it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Louisie G

customer_reviews.title: This is a great addition to my reloading bench
customer_reviews.text: This is a great addition to my reloading bench. Will clean easy, fully adjustable, very comfortable and rolls easy. I would recomend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Slightom

customer_reviews.title: Setting high  and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Chair was very easy to assemble and it works great in my Observatory perfect fit
customer_reviews.author: W. A.R

customer_reviews.title: Part missing!
customer_reviews.text: One of the main pieces, the cylinder (part 3), is missing from the box! I can’t assemble it because it was shipped to me without all the parts.
customer_reviews.author: K. Haston

customer_reviews.title: The backrest is poorly manufactured
customer_reviews.text: The plastic on the backrest separates from the cushion on both of the chairs that I bought as you lean back a few times
customer_reviews.author: Vuk

customer_reviews.title: Excelent value.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product for the price. I am very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Hecco

customer_reviews.title: Way more comfortable than I even hoped
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to assemble and really comfortable to sit in.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality chair for the price. Only down side is that there is no locking mechanism on the wheels, but you can get used to that.
customer_reviews.author: eddy

customer_reviews.title: Great for a sound booth
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. We use it at a sound booth and needed an elevated chair. It's great and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: price
customer_reviews.text: Good price always like quick shipping, attractively made good quality
customer_reviews.author: Paula A Long

product_meta.title: Office Star Sculptured Vinyl Seat and Back Pneumatic Drafting Chair with Adjustable Chrome Foot ring, Black
product_meta.description: Color:BlackSculptured seat and back vinyl drafting chair with adjustable foot ring. Pneumatic Height adjustment 24" to 34" overall. Heavy duty nylon base with dual wheel carpet casters
feature_bullets: The Economical Drafting Chair features Pneumatic seat height adjustment allowing quick positioning for every task
Back height and seat depth adjustment gives you a personalized ergonomic preference
Height adjustable footrest for additional support
Made from a durable vinyl seat and back for all day comfort
Heavy duty nylon base with dual wheel carpet casters allow you to move smoothly and efficiently
